DOC.brief_summary: To compare rate extent absorption doxycycline tablet ( Par ) versus doxycycline capsule ( Monodox ) ( Oclassen ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Doxycycline Tablets Monodox Capsules Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To compare rate extent absorption doxycycline 150 mg tablet ( test ) versus Monodox 50 mg capsule ( reference ) administer 1 x 50 mg tablet 3 x 50 mg capsule fast condition .
